Package org.eclipse.emf.compare.ide.ui.internal.preferences

Interface EMFCompareUIPreferences

public interface EMFCompareUIPreferences
Set of preferences affecting the behavior of the EMF Compare user interface.

Default values for each of these can be checked from EMFCompareUIPreferencesInitializer.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String DISABLE_RESOLVERS_PREFERENCE
    Preference telling us whether the model resolvers are enabled (value false) or disabled (value true).
    static java.lang.String DISABLE_THREADING_PREFERENCE
    Preference telling us whether the model resolver can use threading (value false) or if it should remain single-threaded (value true).
    static java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_EXPAND_LEVEL
    Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically expand the tree viewer of the top panel to a specific level.
    static java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_SELECT_FIRST_CHANGE
    Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically select the first change in the tree viewer of the top panel.
    static java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_EXPAND_TIMEOUT
    Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to limit the number of seconds spent expanding the tree viewer during auto expand and expand-all.
    static java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_HIGHLIGHT_RELATED_CHANGES
    Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically highlight changes related to the current selection in the tree viewer of the top panel.
    static java.lang.String ENABLE_MODEL_RESOLUTION_FROM_CONTAINERS
    Preference indicating whether a the EMFModelProvider should be active also for comparisons of containers.
    static java.lang.String MODEL_PROVIDER_CACHE_TIMEOUT
    Preference key holding the value for the EMFModelProvider's internal cache expiration time.
    static java.lang.String PRE_MERGE_MODELS_WHEN_CONFLICT
    Preference indicating whether a pre-merge must be performed when a REAL conflict is detected.
    static java.lang.String RESOLUTION_SCOPE_PREFERENCE
    Preference telling EMF Compare which scope to crawl for cross-referenced resources.
    static java.lang.String SELECT_NEXT_UNRESOLVED_DIFF
    Preference indicating whether the next unresolved diff should be selected after a merge action.

  • Field Details

    • DISABLE_RESOLVERS_PREFERENCE

      static final java.lang.String DISABLE_RESOLVERS_PREFERENCE
      Preference telling us whether the model resolvers are enabled (value false) or disabled (value true).
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DISABLE_THREADING_PREFERENCE

      static final java.lang.String DISABLE_THREADING_PREFERENCE
      Preference telling us whether the model resolver can use threading (value false) or if it should remain single-threaded (value true).
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • RESOLUTION_SCOPE_PREFERENCE

      static final java.lang.String RESOLUTION_SCOPE_PREFERENCE
      Preference telling EMF Compare which scope to crawl for cross-referenced resources. Should be one of the literals from CrossReferenceResolutionScope.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • PRE_MERGE_MODELS_WHEN_CONFLICT

      static final java.lang.String PRE_MERGE_MODELS_WHEN_CONFLICT
      Preference indicating whether a pre-merge must be performed when a REAL conflict is detected. The expected values are true or false.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • ENABLE_MODEL_RESOLUTION_FROM_CONTAINERS

      static final java.lang.String ENABLE_MODEL_RESOLUTION_FROM_CONTAINERS
      Preference indicating whether a the EMFModelProvider should be active also for comparisons of containers. The expected values are true or false.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_EXPAND_LEVEL

      static final java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_EXPAND_LEVEL
      Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically expand the tree viewer of the top panel to a specific level.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • EDITOR_TREE_EXPAND_TIMEOUT

      static final java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_EXPAND_TIMEOUT
      Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to limit the number of seconds spent expanding the tree viewer during auto expand and expand-all.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_SELECT_FIRST_CHANGE

      static final java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_AUTO_SELECT_FIRST_CHANGE
      Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically select the first change in the tree viewer of the top panel.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • EDITOR_TREE_HIGHLIGHT_RELATED_CHANGES

      static final java.lang.String EDITOR_TREE_HIGHLIGHT_RELATED_CHANGES
      Preference key holding the value for the comparison editor to automatically highlight changes related to the current selection in the tree viewer of the top panel.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SELECT_NEXT_UNRESOLVED_DIFF

      static final java.lang.String SELECT_NEXT_UNRESOLVED_DIFF
      Preference indicating whether the next unresolved diff should be selected after a merge action. The expected values are true or false.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • MODEL_PROVIDER_CACHE_TIMEOUT

      static final java.lang.String MODEL_PROVIDER_CACHE_TIMEOUT
      Preference key holding the value for the EMFModelProvider's internal cache expiration time. This can only be changed at startup.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values
